divs: Sighting DetailsTonight May 20th 2012 around 2:30 am i Ryan Gradwell was out messing around with an electric Rc car out front of my building when i saw a flash of something in the north east sky, I saw around 6 or 7 Stars in the NE sky That were clumped together and then i saw the flash again but it was much bigger then the twinkle of a star at 1st i thought ok well it must have been the death of a star then i saw 1 of the clumped stars move close to another star and stop then i knew it was no dying star so i continued watching just below the clumped stars that big flash kept appearing and disappearing around 5000-10,000 ft from surface within the area below the clumped stars. i then noticed this blue and red dull shinning orb about 200 ft from the tree line East of my position hovering silently with very few flashes of white light i focused on the large flashing as it seemed to be flashing toward me very fast i became very light headed and dizzy my cat was completely on edge and i had went in to get a witness only to have that person watch for 2min then gave up and went inside i then went inside but it seems that there is major activity with U.F.O.'S in my area every night there is helicopters flying at all hours of the night i have questioned about it and was told it is the only time the police can practice training... So they must either be really slow learners or they are training every cop in the world because i hear and see them constantly training every night for almost a year now some 2-3 at once lasting threw till the next day actually i can hear 1 now so i guess there training hours have been extended .... right!
Summary: group of hovering stars all moving then a big flash as 1 appeared close to the earth then almost 300ft away it flashed again an traveld in a forward motion above me with blue red orb 300 ft in treeline
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Oshawa
There were no other sightings in Oshawa on or around May 20th 2012
